statements: UPDATE IrrigationControl SET device_name = 'Sprinkler System', irrigation_enabled = TRUE WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE sensors SET status = true WHERE sensor_id = 1;
UPDATE measurements SET measurement_value = 25.6, timestamp = '2021-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE sensor_id = 2;
UPDATE sensors SET sensor_type = 'Temperature Sensor', status = TRUE WHERE sensor_id = 1;

UPDATE Sensors SET placement='Field 1', status='Online' WHERE sensor_id=3;
UPDATE IrrigationSystems SET status = 'Active' WHERE system_id = 1

UPDATE weather_data SET temperature = 30, humidity = 70 WHERE timestamp >= '2022-03-15 12:00:00' AND timestamp <= '2022-03-15 16:00:00';
